root.name: Neptune's Pride
root.description: OverviewNeptune's Pride is a multi-player 4x strategy game played in browser. The game is developed by Iron Helmet Games and is real time with games being played over a number of weeks. The aim of the game is to conquer a large majority of the planets in the match while also dealing with the other players. Diplomacy has a large focus and is done through private messages to the players in game. Later a sequel was released Neptune's Pride 2.
